verbs.description: [V: Appearing] [ARGM-LOC: on Tuesday ’s CBS This Morning] , [ARG1: liberal comedian and Daily Show host Trevor Noah] surprisingly gave Donald Trump credit for his peace summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong - un and urged viewers to “ not hate on ” the President in the wake of the historic meeting .
